verbs.description: [V: s] a rep calls abbott tax plan vague on school funding republican gov greg abbott wants to limit how much money local school districts can raise each year through property taxes promising the state will make up the difference according to an 80-page proposal his office has shared with business groups and school officials but abbott plan does not detail how the state will make up for billions of dollars of revenue texas school districts would lose he floated the 2 5-percent cap in chandra villanueva abbott republican party gov greg abbott seth rau henry b gonzalez convention center abbott laboratories alamo heights isd legislature school governor office texas tribune rep diego bernal williamson county san antonio independent school district rep diego bernal gov greg abbott billy calzada austin san antonio texas
